name: RoboHelp HTML Project File
summary: Learn about .XPJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: XPJ projects are often used for developing help manuals and knowledgebases for software applications.

description: Help project file created by RoboHelp, a help content authoring application; saved using XML formatting and contains references to HTML help files and other help content assets; also contains navigation, table of contents, and search indexing information.
